value.title: Black Lawmakers Call for Ban of Police Facial Recognition

value.title: Microsoft Teams’ new Together Mode is designed for pandemic-era meetings
value.excerpt: Microsoft is introducing some big updates to Microsoft Teams today. The software giant has been working on a new “Together Mode” for Teams ever since the COVID-19 pandemic began, and it’s designed to create a virtual live avatar of yourself that’s supposed to help you better engage with meetings.
